commit.message:
- changed Letsencrypt to Certbot where appropriate to reflect name
change back in May 2016 in README.md
- fixed some typos in README.md as well
- changed letsencrypt to certbot in Dockerfile and used new repository name
(git checkout tags was not possible with old repository name..!?)
- changed CentOS, Certbot, and Jobber to specific versions instead of latest
- changed location to /opt/certbot instead of /opt/letsencrypt/letsencrypt
- added /opt/certbot to $PATH
- added --no-bootstrap to all certbot-auto commands to avoid installing
packages via yum (this also fails with CentOS 7.4..!?)
- added certificate file permission deploy hook to docker-entrypoint.sh
